name: Izzah
greetingText: Twenty Seven not so bad, eh??
wishText: May the good thing always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: The fact that you're keep trying still amaze me
text2: Tho, life's been hard on you right?
text3: The only thing we can do ya carry on
text4: I wanna be there, give you silly surprise
text5Entry: in the middle of the night,
text5Content: wishing life will go easy on you
replayText: But as long as you're trying, so do I
